Data: Mills to Haddin, 1 run slower ball bowled full outside off, driven off the front foot to mid-off who's standing at the edge of the circle
Mills to Clarke, 2 runs short on middle, pulled away wide of deep square leg for a couple
Mills to Clarke, 1 run slower ball on the off stump, pushed to mid-off for a single
Mills to Haddin, 1 run slower one again, short on the off stump, run down to third man for a single

Mills to Clarke, no run we have an injury here, hopefully just a minor one, spat off the pitch, short of a good length outside off, Haddin missed an upper-cut towards third man, and McCullum was struck hard on the shoulders. He's understandably in a bit of pain there, and the players take a short break while he receives some medi
Mills to Clarke, 1 run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover. 50 up for Australia, at a healthy rate
Vettori to Clarke, no run drifting into the right hander from round the wicket, pushed through quick, tries to work it away on the leg side, gets a thick outside edge
Vettori to Clarke, no run shorter on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
Vettori to Clarke, no run quicker ball on middle and leg, played away to midwicket
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away to deep cover off the back foot
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up on leg stump, driven to midwicket
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run short and wide, cut away to deep cover again
O'Brien to Haddin, no run full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
O'Brien to Haddin, no run short of a length on the off stump, mistimes a pull straight to midwicket
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run short outside off, faild to get the deserved treatment as there's cover in the deep, cut away fiercely
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run full on the off stump, driven wide of mid-off off the front foot for a single
O'Brien to Haddin, no run short of length outside off, much slower through the air there, chopped down to point and they decide against the single
O'Brien to Haddin, no run yorker outside off, tries to driven through the line, gets an edge all along the ground to the keeper
Vettori to Clarke, 2 runs short of a length outside off, cut away powerfully wide of deep cover for a couple
Vettori to Clarke, FOUR runs beautifully timed, flighted on the off stump, charges down the track and lofts it cleanly over mid-off for a boundary
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, driven through the line all along the ground to long-on
Vettori to Haddin, no run short outside off, cut away to cover
Vettori to Haddin, no run flighted on middle and leg, down the track and driven to mid-off
Vettori to Haddin, no run much slower through the air on middle and leg, defended on the on-side
O'Brien to Clarke, no run good length outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run short of a good length outside off, jagged back in a touch, pushed wide of midwicket for a quick single
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, pushed wide of the bowler for a single to mid-off
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run short of a length outside off, slashed away off the back foot to third man
O'Brien to Haddin, no run poor ball, but gets away with it, short and wide, Haddin mistimes a cut straight to point
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run good length outside off, driven uppishly wide of cover for a single
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up, pitches outside leg stump, he comes down the track and pads it away

Vettori to Haddin, SIX runs big one, in the slot for Haddin, full on middle, there's plenty of air on that one, Haddin gets down on one knee and slogs-sweeps it over the deep midwicket boundary for a massive six
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up on middle and off, driven off the front foot to mid-off
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg. pushed off the front foot to long-on
Vettori to Clarke, no run short of a length outside off, cut to short cover
Vettori to Clarke, no run on middle and leg, driven to midwicket
O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs lucky, good length on middle and leg, tries to slog it away over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge just wide of the leg stump to the fine-leg boundary
O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs full and gets the treatment, stays his ground and lofts it cleanly over mid-on for a one bounce four
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run short of a good length on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
O'Brien to Clarke, no run short of a good length on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
O'Brien to Clarke, no run short of a length outside off, nipped back in sharply, Clarke tried ti cut that past point but was surprised by the bounce and inward movement
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven off the front foot wide of mid-on for a single
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Vettori to Haddin, FOUR runs shot! Flighted on middle and off, gets to the pitch by coming down the tracn and driving it firmly back past the bowler to evade long-on to the boundary
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to long-off
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run down the track and driven firmly to long-on
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run flighted outside off stump, eased through the off side to deep cover
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run short of a length on middle, rocks back and pulls it away to deep midwicket
O'Brien to Clarke, no run full on the off stump, driven on the up, falls short of mid-off
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run short of a good length outside off, guided to point off the back foot
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run there it is, full on middle and leg, driven off the front foot comfortably to long-on. Brings up his sixth ODO half-century
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run short and wide, cut away to deep point
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot to third man
O'Brien to Clarke, FOUR runs excellent batting, bowled short of a good length on midd
Elliott to Haddin, no run short of a length outside off, chases it from the crease, the ball swings away at the last moment to miss the outside edge
Elliott to Haddin, 2 runs slower through the air, bowled on a good length outside off, Haddin failed to pick and and just chipped it over Daniel Vettori at mid-off for a couple
Elliott to Haddin, no run full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
Elliott to Haddin, no run on a good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot

Elliott to Haddin, SIX runs in the slot for Haddin there, a hapless slower delivery bowled full on middle and leg, he gets down on one knee and plays a lofted sweep well wide of deep square leg for another big one
Elliott to Haddin, no run short of a length on middle and off, pushed to mid-on
Patel to Clarke, SIX runs flighted on middle, charges down the wicket to smash it over the bowlers head for a huge six. Gets to his 32nd fifty
Patel to Clarke, FOUR runs dropped, short of a length outside off, tries to late cut it in the third-man region, gets a thick outside edge that McCullum gets his glove to but fails to pouch
Patel to Clarke, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Patel to Haddin, 1 run pushed off the front foot through midwicket for a single
Patel to Clarke, 1 run flighted on middle and off, driven down the ground to long-on
Patel to Haddin, 1 run full on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to long-on
Elliott to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
Elliott to Haddin, no run short of a length on the off again, hit to the same fielder albeit a little more firmly
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run slower ball bowled on a good length on middle and leg, pushed through the line to mid-on
Elliott to Clarke, 1 run short on middle and leg, flicked away off the back foot to fine leg
Elliott to Haddin, FOUR runs picked up the slower one there, NZ have bowled way too many of them tooday, full on the off stump, slogged away over midwicket for a boundary. The runs continue to flow
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven to midwicket where a fumble allows them a single. New Zealand losing their guard here
Patel to Haddin, 1 run flighted on middle and off, down the track and flicks it away to deep midwicket
Patel to Clarke, no run tossed up on middle, defended watchfully on the leg side
Patel to Clarke, no run pushed through quicker this time, good length on the off stump, defended
Patel to Clarke, 2 runs superb fielding by Elliot, tossed up on middle, swept away powerfully wide of deep square leg where Elliot dives full length to cut that off just inside the ropes
Patel to Clarke, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, driven to long-on
Patel to Haddin, 1 run short of a length on middle and leg, pushed away off the back foot to deep midwicket
Elliott to Haddin, no run struck on the wrong spot there, short on middle and leg, tries to pull it away over midwicket, misses and he's brave enough to not show he's in pain
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run short outside off, cut away to deep point
Elliott to Clarke, 1 wide wide down the leg side but brilliantly kept by McCullum

Elliott to Clarke, OUT slower one bowled full outside off, Clarke makes room and drives it powerfullu but straight to Martin Guptill at short cover. Finally a wicket but not after an excellent start by the Australian openers
Elliott to Ponting, no run slower ball bowled short outside off, cut away to point
Elliott to Ponting, 1 run off the mark, short of a length outside off, guided off the back foot third man
Elliott to Haddin, no run short of a length on middle and leg, tries to turn it away fine, is s truck high on the pads
Patel to Ponting, no run tossed up on the off stump, defended off the front foot to point
Patel to Ponting, no run flighted on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Patel to Ponting, FOUR runs there are just three fielders in the deep, bowled short outside off and spinning into Ponting, gets on the back foot and punches it through the covers for a boundary
Patel to Ponting, no run flighted outside off, driven back to the bowler
Patel to Ponting, 1 run on middle and leg, flicked away to deep square leg
Patel to Haddin, 1 run short of a good length on the off stump, no spin on that one, eased through the midwicket region for a single
Elliott to Haddin, no run good length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Elliott to Haddin, no run slightly short on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run slower offcutter bowled on a good length outside off, guided to third man for a single
Elliott to Ponting, no run short of a length outside off, cut away to point
Elliott to Ponting, no run good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
Elliott to Ponting, no run short of a good length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, driven to long-off
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs flighted on leg stump, driven gently wide of long-on, plenty of open spaces, they get a couple
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run almost! Short of a length outside off, unexpected bounce there, kicks off the pitch and Haddin struggles to keep it down as it stops him, dabbed uppishly wide of cover
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, eased through the cover region
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run flighted on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run short of a length outside off, guided off the back foot wide of point for a single
Elliott to Haddin, no run slower ball bowled short on the off stump, pushed to mid-on
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run The mid-on fielder has been pushed back now and they get a single in the same region
Elliott to Ponting, 1 run on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to long-on

Elliott to Haddin, FOUR runs dropped, slower ball bowled full on middle and off, lofts it really high wide of Peter Fulton at long-on who puts down an easy chance. He ran a few steps backwards to his right, got into a good position, but spilled it sight at the last moment, deflecting the ball to the boundary
Elliott to Haddin, no run pushed off the back foot to the bowler
Elliott to Haddin, no run on middle and leg, drive to mid-on

Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
Vettori to Haddin, no run good over so far, drives a flighted ball back to the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, no run on middle and leg, driven off the front foot to midwicket. Just one of the over
Elliott to Ponting, 3 runs slower ball on leg stump, worked away off the front really fine, wide of Mills at fine-leg for three runs
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled away to deep midwicket
Elliott to Ponting, 1 run short on middle and leg, flicked away to deep square leg
Elliott to Haddin, no run yorker length outside off, reaches out and digs it out to cover
Elliott to Haddin, FOUR runs shot! Fractionally full outside off, gets forward and drives it well over cover for a boundary
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run good length on middle and leg, turned away neatly to deep square leg
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run short of a length outside off, chopped down to deep cover off the back foot
Vettori to Ponting, no run flighted on the off stump, driven to cover
Vettori to Ponting, no run flighted on the off stump, dropped on the off side , decide against the single
Vettori to Ponting, no run on the off stump, guided off the front foot to point
Vettori to Ponting, no run bowled flatter on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up on middle and off, driven gently to cover. The end of another good over from Vettori
Elliott to Haddin, no run short of a good length on leg stump, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run short outside off, makes room and thrashes that down to deep cover

Elliott to Ponting, OUT top-edge and excellent catch at fine-leg by Mills, short of a length on middle and off, tries to pull it away over square leg, gets the leading edge and Mills, despite the sun being being in his eyes, pouches it superbly
Elliott to Haddin, no run slower ball bowled full on middle and off, driven off the front foot to mid-off
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run short of a good length outside, punched off the back foot to long-off
Elliott to Hussey, FOUR runs shot! Full outside off and he just chips it away over mid-off for a boundary. David Hussey off to a good start here
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run low full toss on middle and leg, driven to long-on, Haddin into the 90's now
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run flighted on leg stump, leans into the drive and plays it to long-on
Vettori to Haddin, no run short of a good length outside off, charges forward and defends it to the off side

Vettori to Haddin, SIX runs Haddin is looking in great form here, tossed up on middle and leg, inviting the batsman to charge forward, lofts it cleanly over long-on for a big six. No sign of nerves here in the nineties for Haddin
Vettori to Haddin, 2 runs almost gets it, tossed up outside off, he makes room and plays it inside-out over cover for a couple, Southee dives well to his left to prevent a certain four
Vettori to Haddin, no run full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run Short of a good length on the off stump, tries to punch it off the back foot wide of the bowler, gets a thick outside edge wide of a diving point for a single
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run short on middle and off, pushed to mid-off, moves to 99
Elliott to Hussey, no run flicked away wide of midwicket
Elliott to Hussey, no run good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run eased through the leg side to give Haddin the strike
Elliott to Haddin, no run full on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler. Haddin will have to wait till the next over

O'Brien to Hussey, OUT edged and gone! The bowling change works wonders. Short of a good length outside off and a hint of away movement and some sharp bounce, tries to run it down to third man, gets a thick outside edge that's snapped up comfortably by McCullum. Important breakthrough there, Hussey was looking good
O'Brien to White, no run short of a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
O'Brien to White, no run beaten by the sharp swing into him, good length on the off stump and jagged back in, White was struck in the mid-riff while trying to work it away wide of midwicket
O'Brien to White, no run short of a length outside off, guided off the back foot to point
O'Brien to White, no run short on middle, defended off the back foot to the bowler
O'Brien to White, no run short of a length outside off, pushed to point, maiden over
Southee to Haddin, 1 run gets his maiden ODI century, short outside off, punches it wide of point for a single. Entertaining knock there, off just 107 balls, laced with three sixes
Southee to White, 1 run full outside off, gets a thick outside edge to third man as he tries to drive that through cover
Southee to Haddin, 1 run slower ball bowled full outside off, makes room and slices that away to deep cover
Southee to White, 1 run fell safely there, bowled short on the off stump, tried to pull it towards deep midwicket, mistimes it, it lobs up in the air well short of Jeetan Patel
Southee to Haddin, no run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
Southee to Haddin, 2 runs slower ball on middle, reaches forward and chip it between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
O'Brien to White, no run good length on middle and leg, driven straight to mid-on
O'Brien to White, 1 run tucked away wide of midwicket this time for a single
O'Brien to Haddin, no run yorker outside off, tries to dig out from the crease, fails to bring his bat dow in time
O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs full outside off, makes room and square drives it powerfully wide of point for a boundary
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run short of a length outside off, chopped away towards third man
O'Brien to White, no run good length outside off and swinging away a touch, left alone to the keeper
Southee to Haddin, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven wide of mid-on for a single, it brings up the 200

Southee to White, OUT run out, yorker length on middle, dug out awkwardly and Haddin storms down the pitch for a quick single, the ball rolls to McCullum who dives forward to throw down the stumps at the strikers end, to find Haddin well short of his ground. End of a superlative century from Haddin, but the middle-order now needs
Southee to Hussey, 1 run short of a good length outside off, pushed wide of cover for a quick single
Southee to White, 1 wide full down the leg side, tries to glance it down fine, misses
Southee to White, 1 run full toss on middle and leg, punched down the ground to long-on
Southee to Hussey, 1 run good length on middle and off, dropped on the off side and they scamper a quick single
Southee to White, 1 run yorker length outside leg, dug out wide of midwicket for a single
O'Brien to White, 1 run short on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a quick single
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away smartly to third man
O'Brien to White, 1 wide bouncer banged in short outside leg, too high there and given a wide
O'Brien to White, FOUR runs White finally gets a boundary, he was kept quite until now, but that was banged in short outside off and he pulls it away powerfully wide of deep midwicket for a boundary

O'Brien to White, OUT poor shot, bowled on a good length on the off stump, he goes for a blind loft over mid-off, mistimes it completely, gets a lot of elevation on it, Vettori takes a couple of steps back and takes a well-judged catch
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs how did that miss, short of a good length outside off, tries to run it down to third man, gets an inside edge over middle stump to the fine-leg boundary
O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs good running there, worked away between deep square leg and fine leg for a couple
Southee to Ferguson, no run short of a length outside off and jagged back, guided to point off the back foot
Southee to Ferguson, no run slower ball bowled full outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
Southee to Ferguson, FOUR runs shot! Short of a length outside off, cut away over point wide of a diving third man for a pressure-relieving boundary
Southee to Ferguson, 1 run too straight, on middle and leg, whipped away off the pads to deep square leg
Southee to Hussey, 1 run slower ball on leg stump, turned away to square leg for a single
Southee to Ferguson, no run short outside of, held its line, slashed at it off the back foot, missed
Southee to Hussey, 1 run good length on middle and off, comes down the track and turns it away wide of midwicket for a single
Southee to Ferguson, 1 run full toss on leg stump, driven all along the ground to long-off
Southee to Hussey, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Southee to Ferguson, 1 bye full and down the leg side, tries to glance it down fine, McCullum fumbles it, given a bye
Southee to Hussey, 1 run full outside off, driven through the off side, wide of cover for a single
Southee to Ferguson, FOUR runs poor ball, full on the pads with fine-leg up, flicked away really to beat the fielder there to the boundary
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs short on middle, turned away off the back foot wide of deep square leg to come back for a well run two. Lots of open spaces in the deep on the leg side
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, slogged away to deep square leg for a single
Vettori to Ferguson, 2 runs short of a length outside off, comes on really slow to the batsman, walks across and paddles it wide of fine-leg for two more

Vettori to Ferguson, OUT plumb in front! Tossed up on middle, bowled really slow at 78 kmph, he is into the sweep shot really early, is done is by the pace, strikes him on the back leg on line with the stumps and Bucknor makes a straightforward decision
Vettori to Hopes, no run driven towards short cover
Vettori to Hopes, 1 run driven off the front foot to long-on
Mills to Hussey, 1 run good length outside off, driven uppishly off the front foot to mid-off
Mills to Ferguson, 1 run on middle and leg, flicked away to deep square leg
Mills to Hussey, FOUR runs short on middle, gets on the back foot and pulls it away over midwicket for a boundary
Mills to Hussey, FOUR runs and again, slower ball, a rank long hop on leg stump, Hussey rocks on the back foot and helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
Mills to Hussey, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, eased through the covers for a single
Mills to Ferguson, no run slower ball bowled short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run yorker length on middle, flicked away to deep square leg
O'Brien to Ferguson, FOUR runs shot! Full on the off stump, makes room and slices it away wide of point, beautifully timed, picked the length perfectly
O'Brien to Ferguson, 2 runs full on middle and leg, walks across and works it away wide of deeep square leg for a couple
O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run slower ball bowled short of a length outside off, run down to third man
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run short of a length on middle and off, mistimes a pull wide of midwicket
O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run good length on middle, makes room and chops it wide of point for a single
O'Brien to Hopes, no run low full toss on leg stump, driven straight to midwicket
O'Brien to Hopes, no run slower ball bowled short outside off, tries to cut that away, but is into the shot too early, misses
O'Brien to Hopes, 1 run good length outside off, driven on the up to long-off
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run full toss on middle and leg this time, flicked away from the crease to deep midwicket
O'Brien to Hopes, 1 run low full toss on middle, makes room and drives it down the ground to long-off
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run slower ball bowled short on middle and leg, pulled away to deep square leg
Southee to Hussey, 1 run full outside off, tries to drive it through the covers, gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a single
Southee to Hopes, 1 run full outside off, slogged away to long-on
Southee to Hussey, 1 run tight bowling here, almost yorker length outside off, squeezed through to cover
Southee to Hopes, 1 run an attempted inswinging yorker on middle and leg, driven all along the ground for a single to long-on
Southee to Hussey, 1 run good length outside off, makes room and strikes it firmly to deep cover
Southee to Hopes, 2 runs full outside off, driven to long-off, it takes a while to reach the fielder who's a touch too deep and they scramble back for the second
Mills to Ferguson, 1 run short of a length on the off stump, worked away off the back foot to deep square leg
Mills to Hussey, 2 runs short outside off, cut away wide of third man, he rushes back for the second, and despite an accurate throw, makes it comfortably
Mills to Hussey, 1 run good length outside off, comes down the track and drives it crisply to cover, who misfields to allow the batsmen a single
Mills to Ferguson, FOUR runs poor ball, short on middle, he pulls it away fiercely wide of midwicket for a boundary
Mills to Ferguson, 1 run short of a good length outside off, opens the face to guide it wide of point for a quick single
Mills to Hussey, FOUR runs Australia are going great guns here, slower ball bowled full outside off, he makes room and slices it over the two gully's stationed on the off side for a boundary
Vettori to Ferguson, no run quicker one bowled short on the off stump, cut away to point
Vettori to Ferguson, no run fired in quick again, on middle and off, defended off the back foot
Vettori to Ferguson, no run short of a length outside off, cut well but straight to the point fielder
Vettori to Ferguson, 1 run drifting into the right hander from round the wicket, steered wide of point for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run much slower through the air, flighted on a good length outside off, tries to drive it to cover, misses
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run flighted on the off stump, lands full, opens the face to play it wide of point for a quick single
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs short of a length on middle and Hussey lashes on to that one, pulled away powerfully to the deep square leg boundary
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run almost had him lbw there, full on middle and off, tries to swing that away over short fine, gets a thin inside edge onto his pads
O'Brien to Hopes, 1 run yorker length outside off, dragged away wide of midwicket for a single

O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs shot! Low full toss on middle, bends just a touch and lofts it between deep midwicket and long-on for a boundary. 50 for Hussey, a very timely one, scored off just 30 balls
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket for a single
O'Brien to Hopes, OUT full and straight, and it's timber! Yorker length on middle, Hopes makes room to slice that over point, misses it completely and hears the death rattle behind him

Mills to Hussey, OUT Hussey holes out in the deep, slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, he gets forward and slogs it straight to Ross Taylor at deep midwicket. End of a cruical innings after the openers had given the hosts a sound start
Mills to Johnson, 1 run slower ball bowled on a good length on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off

Mills to Bracken, 1 run dropped, good length on the off stump, driven back past the bowler who gets a hand but deflects it to long-off. That was firmly struck, and though catchable, was a really sharp chance

Mills to Johnson, no run 300 up! Low full toss on leg stump, driven back past the bowler who fumbles to allow the batsmen to come back for two. However, the batsmen were warned there for running on the danger area of the wicket for the second time, and therefore the runs have been negated
Mills to Johnson, OUT gone! Slower ball on middle and leg, slogged away straight to Jeetan Patel at deep midwicket.

Mills to Bracken, 2 runs full outside off, driven off the front foot to long-off, the fielder there returns a wayward throw to McCullum to allow the batsmen to come back for the second and go past 300

An admirable batting display by Australia here, as the middle order succeeded in building on a good opening partnership. Haddin was the star for the hosts, reaching his maiden ODI century, and was well supported by Clarke who reached his second consecutive half-century. Hussey and Ferguson scored some quick runs in the batting powerplay
All set, the New Zealand response is about to begin. They have a really challenging score to scale down here. Bracken to bowl and Guptill to face
Bracken to Guptill, 1 run runs straightaway, short of a length on middle and leg, pushed away wide of midwicket for a single
Bracken to Fulton, no run good length outside off and moving away, left alone
Bracken to Fulton, no run good length on middle and off, driven off the front foot to m,id-off
Bracken to Fulton, no run beaten, good length outside off and leaving the right hander, prods at it off the back foot, clips the pads on the way to the keeper
Bracken to Fulton, no run full outside off, leaving the right hander there, left alone
Bracken to Fulton, FOUR runs erring in length there, full on the pads and Fulton flicks it away uppishly over midwicket for a boundary
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run good testing line outside iff, swinging away after pitching, left alone to the keeper who collects it waist-high

Bracken to Fulton, no run good length on the off stump, gets across to defend on the leg side

Bracken to Fulton, no run good length outside off and angling away, Fulton shoulders arms to that one

Bracken to Fulton, no run good length, pitches marginally outside leg stump, and moves into the right hander. Strikes him on his pads as he tries to defend it off the front foot. Looked close, but pitched a fraction outside leg
Bracken to Fulton, 2 runs good length on middle and leg, gets an inside edge wide of deep square leg for a couple
Bracken to Fulton, no run full on the off stump, defended watchfully on the off side

Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run short on the off stump, defended off the back foot to cover
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run short of a good length outside off, chopped down to short point

Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover

Bracken to Guptill, no run good length outside off and swinging away from the right hander, defended off the front foot to cover

Bracken to Fulton, no run short of a length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, FOUR runs straying on the pads, he gets on the back foot and glances it fine to the fine-leg boundary

Hilfenhaus to Taylor, OUT he's given him! Good length on middle, and held its line this time. Taylor came forward to defend, missed it completely and was struck in line. Correct decision there, Taylor showed his bat to the umpire immediately upon being struck on the pads, but Bucknor is having none of the nonsense

Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 2 runs short of a length outside, guided wide of third man

Bracken to McCullum, 1 run good length outside off, chipped towards long-off for a single
Bracken to Patel, no run slower ball bowled full outside off, goes for a wild swing over long-off, misses it completely
Bracken to Patel, no run how did that miss the stumps? Slower offcutter bowled on a good length outside off, cuts away off the pitch just when he tries to guide it to third man
Bracken to Patel, 1 run full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of point for a single to keep the strike
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 2 runs short outside off, makes room to swat it over mid-off and wide of cover for a couple

Hilfenhaus to McCullum, OUT that's it, almost all over for New Zealand, full toss outside off stump, tries to smash it over the covers, mistimes it straight to Ponting who's standing there at the edge of the circle. The bat slips out of McCullum's hands as he goes for the shot
Hilfenhaus to Patel, 1 run shot, short of a length outside off, cut away fiercely to deep point
Hilfenhaus to O'Brien, no run bouncer banged in short on middle, the batsmen ducks under it
Hilfenhaus to O'Brien, no run another attempted bouncer, bowled short on middle, the batsmen backs away from it
Hilfenhaus to O'Brien, no run short on middle again, tries to help it one its way to fine leg, misses
Bracken to Patel, no run slower ball bowled full outside off, looks to smash that away over mid-off, misses
Bracken to Patel, SIX runs big one! Excellent shot, he got stuck into that one, slower ball bowled full on middle, swung away off the front foot over deep midwicket for a six

New Zealand batted well to reach where they did, and when Elliott and McCullum were going strong, a win could not have been ruled out. Partnerships were the key for New Zealand as their middle order put together productive stands at a fairly good rate, despite a poor start. Brad Haddin has been adjudicated as the Man of the Match, and A
Australia won by 32 runs
Player of the match is Brad Haddin, AUS
